short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find yummy recipes for breakfast, lunch or dinner, all from your browser with the OMG Recipes extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover a wide range of mouthwatering recipes using the OMG Recipes extension. Search for recipes by ingredient and get step-by-step instructions along with nutritional information. Find quick recipes for breakfast, lunch, and dinner, including international favorites, and diet-friendly alternatives.

How to use the recipe finder:

1. Click the puzzle icon on your browser toolbar to access the widget
2. Enter an ingredient or the name of a dish into the recipe finder search bar, or find a recipe by cuisine, meal type, or diet from the drop-down menus.
3. Click on a recipe to view its ingredients, instructions, and nutrition facts.
4. Easily print, download, share, or save all your favorite recipes.

Want to share feedback? Please fill out this form and help us improve the product for you:
